programme.desc: A woman who cares for her ailing father is struggling to sell her home in a desirable neighborhood. Leslie and Lyndsay jump at the opportunity to transform the outdated property into an industrial-chic showstopper that's perfect for a high-end buyer.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Leslie and Lyndsay help a family struggling to sell their roadside rambler. Hoping to distract buyers from the road noise outside, the twins make some bold design choices to turn the dated ranch house into a stylish home that a new family will love.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A young family has outgrown their home, but major exterior issues and a dark interior are keeping it from being sold. Leslie and Lyndsay brighten and repair the outdated rambler, but pricing it right will be difficult with no comps in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A couple that's desperate to sell their bungalow after receiving no offers calls on real estate experts and twins Leslie and Lyndsay. The home needs some love to make it sellable, but the stakes are raised when the twins invest money to make improvements.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A young millennial's recent home improvement projects have made it hard for her to sell her condo. Twins Leslie and Lyndsay transform her DIY disaster into a hip, modern home, perfect for a first-time home buyer.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Karen and Mina are tackling a special project, Karen's new barn-shaped guesthouse that she has been dreaming of for years.

programme.desc: Design assistant MJ, and his husband recently bought their first home, and Mina and Karen want to make MJ's dreams a reality. The duo works to blend traditional and modern styles, but MJ may have to compromise to stay in budget.

programme.title: The Zimmern List
programme.desc: Andrew visits Philadelphia and reveals its status as a cultural crossroads by making stops at Mexican, Indonesian and Israeli restaurants. Finally, a trip to Philadelphia isn't complete without visiting the oldest Italian restaurant in America.

programme.title: The Zimmern List
programme.desc: Andrew heads to Charleston, SC, and his first order of business is paying a visit to the queen of soul food. Then, he chows down on Gullah cuisine, a favorite among locals, and indulges in fresh seafood.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew highlights the seafood lover's paradise of North Carolina's Outer Banks region. The unique location serves up dishes like blue crab, Hatteras clam chowder, baked oysters and other mouthwatering feasts born of the ocean.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern goes on a gastronomic tour of Las Vegas, NV. From quail breast stuffed with foie gras and mouth-watering Waygu steaks to classic veal Parmigiana and tantalizing Thai, Sin City has it all.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern takes a culinary tour of Aruba, where the climate is as warm as the people. He indulges in local favorites like hearty Dutch pea soup, comforting yet elegant seafood cazuela and sweet, buttery cashew cake.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Boston is the heart of New England, the birthplace of American independence and home to so many delicious foods that it calls for more than one visit! Andrew Zimmern explores the flavours of Boston neighborhoods.

programme.title: Unwrapped 2.0
programme.desc: Alfonso Ribeiro proves that no matter how you slice it, cheese just makes everything better. Find out how TGI Fridays' cheddar bacon potato skin appetizer gets turned into a yummy chip and how Mom Made Cheesy Mac tastes.

programme.title: Unwrapped 2.0
programme.desc: Rise and Dine with Unwrapped 2.0 and find out how the light and airy French donut gets its fancy twist, as well as how sprouted wheat turns into a hearty, tasty cinnamon raisin bagel.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean throws the carb-free diet out the window and uncovers the stories behind our favorite baked goodies. He starts by revealing that cupcakes are edible equations and explaining how the whoopie pie nearly caused a civil war.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean goes on a spectacular journey of some super stuffed foods. Find out if bao are good enough to save our necks, if toasted ravioli are a big stuffed lie and whether knishes could once land you in jail.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: All is not what it seems as Michael McKean reveals the truth behind dishes in disguise. He uncovers what it took to make turducken tick, and how it takes more than magic to get soup inside soup dumplings.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Put down your fork and get ready to pick up some amazing finger food facts! Michael McKean has things handled, finding out how appetizers found their footing during Prohibition, that a king turned tapas into a tableside treat.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Michael McKean has gadgets and gizmos a'plenty, and he's ready to show them all off! Discover that waffle irons were once incredible artists and the stand mixer almost went overboard, and find out why refrigerators could have been left out in the cold.

programme.title: Food: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: Host Michael McKean takes us on a satisfying sleigh ride to find out if Yule log cakes can keep evil at bay, and if panettone was actually created by a Tony.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: After a visit from federal ice cream agents and investigating the ingredients, Alton cracks the code of making homemade ice cream.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Alton concocts a protein bar, an 'energy' bar, and a healthy crispy puffed rice treat.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Alton investigates the ins and outs of ordering, eating, shopping for, and even making sushi.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Alton dives into the pantry to investigate the many facets of vinegar.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Alton teaches us how to build a better batter for waffles.

programme.title: Good Eats
programme.desc: Learn to make better meatballs, use a muffin pan in new ways and to cook Swedish meatballs, a 60's summer classic.

programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: It's time to go big or go home with Roger Mooking as he explores the most extreme dishes. The featured chefs are creating the most jaw-dropping, spectacular dishes on the food scene.

programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking takes 15 gastronomical trips for the most exotic, flavourful and spicy foods all without leaving the U.S. The featured chefs create classic international meals from Ethiopia, Thailand, Mexico and more in their own American kitchens.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger visits two caterers in the South who specialize in live-fire cookouts. He starts in Chattanooga, Tennessee where Argentinian grill master Mariano Cebrián has an incredible collection of portable rigs to create fantastical live-fire events.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger visits two Texas pit masters who give breakfast a wake-up call by adding barbecue. Reid Guess smoked his first brisket when he was just 7 years old, and built his first smoker when he was in 7th grade.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: The smoke signals lead Roger to two popular food trucks in Texas serving up delicious ethnic eats. In Grapevine, Texas, Roger meets Pit Master Trey Sánchez of Vaqueros Bar-B-Q who is known for combining authentic Texas-style barbecue with Mexican dishes.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger heads to the Aloha State where Chef Lee Anne Wong fires up a custom-made stainless-steel shelving unit with local kiawe wood and prepares a tropical feast of succulent beer-can chicken, slow-roasted fruits and vegetables.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb ventures to beautiful Boise, Idaho, for a sushi and soup challenge so diabolically spicy, it goes by the name of Demon's Delight.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey travels to San Diego to face off against a five and a half pound stack of pancakes layered with bacon, eggs, sausage, country-fried steak and thick-cut ham.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb travels to Minnesota's largest city, where he tries a legendary burger that's become a regional icon, noshes on a gigantic brunch meal served with its own food Ferris wheel and takes on a massive four-pound banh mi behemoth.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb lands in Worcester, MA, where he slurps down some radical ramen, indulges in peanut butter cup French toast and takes on a rack of deep-fried ribs with the heat of a million Scoville units.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Adam goes to Tucson for a hot dog wrapped in bacon and covered in all the fixins.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb's search for the biggest and best in Santa Fe, New Mexico, starts with a sopapilla stuffed with carne asada. Then he takes on some game-changing ice cream flavored with the local delicacy, green chiles.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb's cross-country food frenzy brings him to Miami, Florida, where he first tackles a triple-layer burger. Next, he delights in some innovative, Cuban-inspired ice cream flavored with cream cheese, guava and cookies.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb's tasty travels bring him to Manchester, New Hampshire, for an epic portion of barbecue that's served on a shovel at KC's Rib Shack. At local favourite Mr. Mac's Mac and Cheese, he only has eyes for their magnum opus.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew and 'Que
programme.desc: Michael Symon heads to his hometown of Cleveland to visit a brewery that revolutionizes classic pub fare with decadent confit chicken wings in chipotle-maple glaze.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew and 'Que
programme.desc: Chef Michael Symon sinks his teeth into a burger in Memphis, Tenn., that's so dangerously good, innocent bystanders had better beware! Then pizza gets a brunch makeover in Atlanta with creamy scrambled eggs and crispy pancetta.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew and 'Que
programme.desc: Michael Symon gets things started in Boston where a whole smoked hog is getting the royal treatment with a marinade injection, a salt crust and a foil wrap for crispy skin. Then in Phoenix, a wolf of a burger gets topped with smoked pulled pork.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew and 'Que

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi are determined not to let Dave distract them from a good score, while Darrell wants to find out more about the elusive Mogul. Dave shows up with even more bluster, and Ivy uncovers a treasure that promises adventure on the high seas.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon are excited to return to West Covina as it is a hidden honeypot for the duo. While it's off the beaten path, Jarrod and Brandi decide to follow Darrell's lead into the Inland Empire. Plus, Ivy searches for low level merchandise.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Mega Cash Days
programme.desc: Sixteen racers come together to race down to four. Larry Larson and Robin Roberts keep working together, and by the luck of the chip draw, JJ da Boss and Ryan Martin line up in one of the most exciting races of the night.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: For the first time since it began, Big Chief throws out the Top Ten list. In the most intense racing in years, OKC drivers must now compete in a high-stakes qualifier for five spots on America's List.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides: Beyond Bitchin'
programme.desc: Kindig-it Design shares something that makes their rides bitchin'.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: An iconic 1960 Cadillac is brought in for an overhaul but Dave needs some convincing as the client has dreams of turning his pride and joy into a copper hot rod. A rare one-off 2010 Camaro arrives for repairs and the guys take a look back at '72 Bronco.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A year and a half of metal grinding, panel matching, and a whole lot of copper all come together as the 'Copper Caddy' is finished for its show-stopping debut.

programme.title: Geared Up
programme.desc: A pink, air-cooled, 1973 Porsche 911 RS is upgraded with a custom-built engine, new paint, and new wheels and tires.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A client with a '64 Malibu rolls into Kindig-It-Design to catch the rest of the outdated car up to all the power under its hood. Dave gets behind the wheel of a '72 Datsun.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Dennis always dreamed of owning the bright orange 1970 Shelby GT500 that once kicked his ass in a drag race, but severe salt corrosion has all but destroyed this classic. Rikk wants to get his rare 1970 Chrysler 300 Hurst in shape, but it's a challenge.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: The guys bring in a pair of older daily driver trucks. An F-350 needs a new transmission, while an '88 GMC gets a few much-needed interior components.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: Matt and Bruno have a new LJ Jeep in the shop to get some performance goodies and other cool styling options. Matt thinks it's a good idea to put it through the mud, but Bruno is not so sure. He thinks it's more of a Mall Crawler than a Mud Crawler.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a 1972 Fiat 124 Spider 'survivor' car. It's all original but the driving experience leaves a lot to be desired. Mike gets crafty on the interior while Ant fixes a leaky differential, replaces a carrier bearing and axle seals.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The 1973 Toyota Celica, the first generation of this iconic model. Mike finds a powerful solution for a rough running engine. Meanwhile, Ant is in the workshop, putting his fabrication skills to the test.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tries to find a profit in a neglected 2002 Mercedes Benz E55 AMG while Ant tackles a major service.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The pinnacle of BMW is the naturally aspirated inline 6-cylinder modern classic that is the E46 M3. Mike finds one with the subframe already fixed, and he challenges Ant to transform the transmission with new tech.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Volvo Amazon 122 a classic Swedish auto with true rally heritage. Mike travels to the Pacific Northwest, where he has tracked down a true barn find. Ant is tasked to make it road worthy before the boys know the true scope of the work ahead.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Land Cruiser can go where very few vehicles can. Mike has found one in fairly good shape, but the original 4-speed transmission won't allow the Land Cruiser to get to highway speeds, so Mike sources a JDM Toyota 5-speed for Ant to install.

programme.desc: MBCs' latest client loves her trucks, particularly the 1950 Chevy. But with a list of customizations the size of Texas, this build is going to seriously test Joe's mechanical genius.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: Collin and Corey must transform a client's beat up Crown Victoria Interceptor into a rat rod. The car is stripped down to a rolling chassis and given a unique body comprised of three 1950s wrecks.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: To attract tourists to North West River and make a friend's culinary dreams come true, the boys scratch-build a gourmet food boat complete with kitchen, barbecue and seating for six.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: The local Search and Rescue squad asks Collin and Corey for a fast and maneuverable craft that can navigate the shallow water that surrounds North West River, so the guys come up with a unique solution by marrying a jet ski to a 14' aluminum fishing boat.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: An old buddy of Collin and Cory's wants to turn his spare snowmobile into a 'Water Skipper' that can skim across the lake in summer. The boys will have to make some special mods & lighten the snowmobile to keep it floating.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: A local roofer wants to repurpose a vintage airport Stair Truck he picked up cheap at auction. Collin and Corey need to repair the hydraulic system and stabilizers to make sure that what goes up, also comes down, in one piece.

programme.title: Last Stop Garage
programme.desc: When a cracked engine block sidelines a client's prized K5 Blazer Bog Truck, Collin & Corey need to find a replacement motor that fulfills his carbureted dreams. TBI or not TBI, that is the questio.

programme.desc: A client needs some improvements on his aging SUV to get him safely to his off-the-grid cabin. Apart from arriving in one piece, his biggest concern is running out of gas to power his generator. The boys come up with a solution, but what is it.

programme.title: Ancient Unexplained Files
programme.desc: A team of explorers discover a forbidding cave system riddled with ancient markings that seem to contain a mysterious meaning; using advanced photogrammetry, experts finally decode these cryptic scrawls to expose a dark chapter of English history.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A strange Cuban prison, an eerie escape route built for Armageddon, and an underwater marvel that changed history are mysterious deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An underground labyrinth once used by a secret police force could warp the mind and turn friend into foe.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An eerie prison with a dark past that became the setting of an iconic Hollywood movie and alien monoliths on a strange and remote island are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A haunted lighthouse on Lake Michigan, a town where everyone seems to have vanished all at once, and a secret complex of tunnels beneath London.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A strange complex of buildings on a remote tropical island was once home to a large seaside community, but today, locals avoid the area and claim that it's haunted. New discoveries reveal why this eerie place was built and why it was abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: Tunnels filled with human bones lie beneath the streets of Paris, and this horrifying engineering marvel points to a dark secret. New discoveries reveal why this grisly underground death maze was built, and why it was abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: At an infamous prison in the Amazon, the most dangerous criminals on earth faced hard labour, a hostile environment and death by guillotine. Today, it's deserted, and new discoveries reveal why this hellish compound was built and why it was abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An abandoned system of caves was once the meeting place of a secret society that worshiped Satan and performed black magic. New discoveries at this mysterious site reveal what really happened here and why a Founding Father was a frequent guest.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: The world's strangest ghost towns are home to dark secrets, creepy buildings, and eerie sights, and new discoveries reveal why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A vast network of subterranean bunkers in the American west was home to the power to destroy nations, but today, this facility is deserted, and new discoveries reveal why this eerie place was built and why it was abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A deserted city half buried, whole villages swallowed by the earth, temples turned to rubble, and an arctic town facing a deadly threat. Within these structures are the echoes of history; each haunted shell now ready to tell its own story.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An abandoned castle is the site of hundreds of horrific murders perpetrated by the mysterious countess who once lived there, a woman alleged to be one of the most prolific killers in history; new discoveries reveal what really happened here.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A strange Soviet monolith known as the Tower of Death and a bizarre bunker constructed by a violent dictator are now forgotten ruins; experts investigate the secrets of these haunting structures to uncover how they were built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: In a remote Louisiana swamp, the ruins of a massive industrial operation suggest that something evil once happened here, and new discoveries at this eerie site reveal what these abandoned buildings were for and why they were deserted.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: Searching for a Gold Rush ghost town's legendary hidden treasure in the hills surrounding the town.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: Revealing how an alien Nazi structure that changed history, a strange Soviet monolith known as the Tower of Death, and a concrete ocean giant were built, and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: In a remote Louisiana swamp, the ruins of a massive industrial operation suggest that something evil once happened here, and new discoveries at this eerie site reveal what these abandoned buildings were for and why they were deserted.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A strange bunker in a treacherous landscape once belonged a notorious dictator who's paranoid fantasies drove bizarre and elaborate feats of engineering. New discoveries reveal the secrets of these structures and why the nightmares that built them.

programme.title: Bermuda Triangle: The New Secrets
programme.desc: Using cutting-edge technology, experts investigate the truth behind the Bermuda triangle.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Three graves are discovered on the frozen beach of an uninhabited Arctic island, and the mummified corpses inside may answer a centuries-old mystery of an expedition that was literally consumed by the cannibalistic insanity of its mutinous crew.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: After a 2,500-year-old mummy is discovered in Siberia, locals report strange, cataclysmic events that point to an ancient curse; using cutting-edge archaeology, experts reveal who this person was and if they've unleashed something sinister.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A frozen lake deep in the Himalayas melts once a year to expose hundreds of human bones and a centuries-old mystery of astonishing carnage, leaving experts to speculate if it was a single catastrophic event or something much more sinister.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Experts make a chilling new discovery when they unearth a 30,000-year-old zombie virus from an icy grave. If this ancient disease is successfully resuscitated back to life, it could cause a catastrophic global calamity.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: When strange towers of ice are found growing from in a barren, water-starved desert, experts speculate why these structures have uncanny similarities to extraterrestrial formations recently discovered on Pluto's alien landscape.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A top-secret military base hidden deep in the ice beyond the Arctic Circle is one of the Cold War's most elaborate cover-ups, and recently declassified documents reveal its deadly purpose, and the threat it might still pose to all humankind.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New evidence from one of the world's oldest maps offers clues to a long-lost civilization of untold treasure, and this cutting-edge expedition might finally prove that this mysterious kingdom is the ancestral home of the ancient Egyptians.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: The legend of the Fountain of Youth might finally be explained by hidden messages encoded in a 500-year-old map, and using cutting-edge archaeological methods, experts explore forgotten caves and perilous waters to reveal this mystery's long-lost secrets.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New clues taken from long-lost maps offer fresh leads in the hunt for the Ark of the Covenant, and using the latest hi-tech archaeological methods, experts retrace its steps through the Holy Land, Egypt, and Ethiopia to make a game-changing discovery.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New discoveries at the site of an alleged long-lost gold mine could lead investigators to a 200-million-dollar payday, and using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate clues in long-lost maps and relics to recover the Lost Dutchman's treasure.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: Meriwether Lewis was the man who teamed with William Clark to map the lands west of the Mississippi, but he died in mysterious circumstances. Experts reveal a vast conspiracy that could prove that one of America's greatest explorers was murdered.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: A long-lost treasure map claims to know the whereabouts of a missing ship buried with gold and silver in the California desert, and using cutting-edge technology, a team of experts use this new evidence to get close to a game-changing discovery.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New evidence suggests the Maya civilization did not suddenly vanish, but that they instead still survived, they just resettled in the United States. Using cutting-edge tech, experts reveal what really happened to these long-lost people.

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: Mysterious new evidence suggests the Knights Templar fled Europe and rebuilt their fearsome warrior order in the Americas a century before Columbus, and experts use cutting-edge tech to investigate if long-lost relics confirm this game-changing theory.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: The first female pharaoh of ancient Egyptian assumed a sinister alter ego and continues to be shrouded in mystery; experts align advanced archaeological science with the latest discoveries to reveal the dark secrets behind this matriarchal reign.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: From the uniforms to the use of the Swastika, a large component of the Nazi mythology was heavily influenced by the Occult; experts investigate how the Nazi party attempted to shape their political ideology with mystical pagan beliefs and rituals.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: As the Nazi war machine tore through Europe, they plundered museums in search of holy relics that would grant them untold power and prestige. experts investigate how close Hitler was to discovering the Holy Grail and its promise of eternal life.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: The Crocodile Queen was Egypt's first female pharaoh, but we don't who she was, or why she took this sinister alter-ego. New discoveries might finally answer this ancient mystery, and more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: While on a mission to learn what happened to her mother, a woman performs unauthorized in exorcisms.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: A man with psychic powers protects a young girl with similar abilities from a cult.

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: An astronaut returns to earth after an impactful mission, and struggles to reintegrate.

programme.title: Lovelace
programme.desc: Documenting the abusive relationship between Linda Lovelace and her husband during the production of a 1970s adult film.

programme.title: Within
programme.desc: A widower moves into a seemingly perfect new home with his daughter and his new wife.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three adults must track down the werewolf that bit them in order to reverse their fate.

programme.title: Ghost in the Machine
programme.desc: A murderer continues his killing spree when lightning enables his soul to travel through electrical wires.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Two families' histories collide when their children begin to date. After the young couple gets into a horrific accident, their conflicts reach a boiling point.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: An eccentric, childless couple decide to kidnap one baby from a set of quintuplets.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: A husband's seemingly perfect life is threatened by evidence of a past misdeed.

programme.title: Muriel's Wedding
programme.desc: A socially inept young woman with a dysfunctional family yearns for a better life.

programme.title: Idlewild
programme.desc: Two Prohibition-era club owners and performers fend off a vicious gangster determined to cut himself into a share of their profitable speakeasy.

programme.title: Stuber
programme.desc: An aggressive police officer forcefully recruits his uber driver to help with his work.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: In Thailand, a group of Christian aid workers recruit John Rambo to guide them up the Salween River to deliver medical supplies to the Karen tribe of neighbouring Burma (aka Myanmar).

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: A special agent becomes a vigilante after a ruthless assassin murders all of his loved ones during a family reunion.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to their séance scam, a spirit board. When the youngest finds the board, she contacts a spirit and is possessed. Confronting their fears, the small family risks everything to save themselves.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two CIA agents wage war against each other when they find out they have been dating the same woman.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: A group of Sudanese refugees arrive in America to start a new life. They're met at the airport by an employment agency counselor who winds up helping them navigate the 20th century and rebuild their lives.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Twelve strangers wake up, bounded, in the middle of a secluded clearing. Before they're able to wonder how they got there, guns ring and they are forced to find their way through the most sadistic game of all.

programme.title: El Norte
programme.desc: Two siblings travel from Guatemala to the U.S. after their village is massacred.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Newly appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill's position is threatened by political opponents led by a former Prime Minister who desire appeasement with Nazi Germany when Britain's army becomes surrounded and trapped on a beach in France.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: Two young lovers who are about to wed conspire to draw two rivals into a romantic liaison.

programme.title: Belly
programme.desc: Two partners in crime who rob nightclubs together begin to question each other's loyalty.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: Former hitman John Wick, pursued by assassins after being excommunicated by the murder-for-hire underworld, attempts to have the bounty on his head removed.

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: Follows the working relationship that develops between a middle age advertising executive and the young inexperienced business protégé that he finds himself working for after a corporate takeover.

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: Mischievous teenagers hack into a corporate network and stumble upon evidence of a crime.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: An astronaut departs on a mission to discover what happened to a previous expedition that included his father.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In 2046, a team is sent to investigate a spaceship that has resurfaced after many years.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: A depiction of boxer Mickey Ward's early years as his brother trains him to become a professional.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: This film chronicles the sinking of the whaling ship Essex by an enormous whale. This event, which happened in real life, inspired author Herman Melville to write his famous novel Moby Dick.

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Richard Cooper, a bored family man, considers having an affair with an old friend but doesn't want to jeopardize his marriage.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Buddy Hall and Steve Finch are two feuding neighbours, who try to prove to the other that they have more Holiday spirit by overly decorating their houses.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: A woman who works as an elf at a year-round Christmas store meets a man and finds her life changing.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: When three friends realize that quitting their jobs isn't an option they conspire to murder their bosses.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
programme.desc: Arthur's father, the King, was murdered when he was a young boy. Though he managed to escape, Arthur grew up in the back alleys of the city. However, once he pulls a mystical sword from a stone, his life is turned upside down as his legacy appears.

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: A mother and daughter open a chocolate shop in a small conservative French village.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: After winning the heart of her employer, a governess discovers he is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Anna to the Infinite Power
programme.desc: A girl discovers she is the result of a cloning experiment, and tries to find her clones.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple agrees to have a doctor clone their recently deceased eight year-old son. Everything seems fine until their new son reaches the age at which he previously died, and strange things begin to occur.

programme.title: Sophie's Choice
programme.desc: Haunted by her past, a survivor of a Nazi concentration camp struggles to find happiness.

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: An engineer creates a weapon to battle aliens, only to be suspected as an alien himself.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: When a man tries to expose a dark secret about a deceased patriarch, chaos ensues.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three adults must track down the werewolf that bit them in order to reverse their fate.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Following a terrorist attack on an American compound, a team of FBI agents travel to Saudi Arabia in hopes of uncovering and disabling a terrorist network. As the situation escalates, the agents grow increasingly frustrated with Saudi interference.

programme.desc: The story of Johanna Morrigan, an aspiring music journalist in 1990s Wolverhampton.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: A couple struggles to remain faithful to each other when the husband leaves on a business trip.

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: A 28-year-old woman with no motivation or career prospects befriends a 16-year-old girl after fleeing her boyfriend's marriage proposal. Needing a break from her life, she hides out for a week spending time with the high schooler and her single dad.

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: When a young girl finds out she's pregnant, she goes to her grandmother to ask for some money. The duo heads out on a day-long adventure to visit old friends and former flames, all while facing what life has given them.

programme.title: How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: The story of Johanna Morrigan, an aspiring music journalist in 1990s Wolverhampton.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: Rebellious teenager Becky is brought on a weekend getaway to a lake house by her father in an effort to reconnect after her mother's death. The trip takes a turn when a group of convicts on the run, suddenly invade the lake house.
